title: What's New
description: Discover the latest features and updates in Plugged.in. Learn how to use new capabilities with practical guides.

send-notifications-from-ai.title: Send Notifications from Any AI Model
send-notifications-from-ai.description: Get real-time alerts from your AI workflows via notifications and email

content.intro: Now you can send notifications directly from any AI model or MCP tool. Whether you're running long tasks, monitoring errors, or need custom alerts, the notification system keeps you informed in real-time.
content.emailStep1: Go to Settings and enable email notifications
content.useCase3: Custom alerts based on AI analysis

document-context-rag.title: Build AI Apps with Document Context
document-context-rag.description: Upload documents and query them with AI using RAG technology

content.intro: Transform your documents into AI-accessible knowledge. Upload PDFs, text files, and more to create a searchable library that your AI agents can query and reference.
content.uploadDescription: Simply drag and drop your files or use the upload button. Documents are automatically processed and indexed for fast retrieval.

encryption-security.title: Your MCP Servers Are Now Encrypted
encryption-security.description: Enterprise-grade encryption protects all your sensitive server configurations

content.intro: All sensitive MCP server data is now automatically encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption. Your API keys, environment variables, and commands are protected at rest.
content.sharingDescription: When you share servers, only sanitized templates are exposed. Sensitive data remains encrypted and private to you.

share-collections.title: Share Your MCP Server Collections
share-collections.description: Create and share curated collections of MCP servers with the community

content.intro: Collections are the perfect way to group related MCP servers and share them with others. Whether you're creating a development toolkit, a data science workflow, or a productivity suite, collections make it easy to share your entire setup.
content.whatAreCollectionsText: Collections are curated groups of MCP servers that work well together. Think of them as recipes - you gather the ingredients (servers) and share the complete dish (collection) with others.
content.createStep1: Navigate to your MCP Servers page
content.createStep3: Name your collection and add a description
content.createStep4: Select servers to include in the collection
content.sharingFeature1: Public collections visible on your profile
content.sharingFeature3: Version control for updating shared collections
content.example1: Full-Stack Development Kit - Database, API, and testing servers
content.example2: AI Research Suite - LLM connectors, data tools, and notebooks
content.example3: DevOps Toolkit - CI/CD, monitoring, and deployment servers
content.example4: Content Creation Bundle - Writing, media, and publishing tools

activity-tracking.title: Real-time Activity Tracking
activity-tracking.description: Monitor all MCP operations and get insights into usage patterns

content.intro: Get complete visibility into your MCP ecosystem with real-time activity tracking. Monitor operations, track usage patterns, and optimize your workflow based on actual data.
content.insightsText: Transform raw activity data into meaningful insights that help you work smarter:
content.insight1Text: See which tools you use most frequently
content.privacyText: All activity data stays within your project. We never share your usage patterns or operational data with third parties. You have complete control over what gets logged and for how long.

customize-experience.title: Customize Your MCP Experience
customize-experience.description: Personalize servers with custom instructions, themes, and languages

content.intro: Make Plugged.in work exactly how you want it to. From custom instructions for each server to personalized themes and language preferences, tailor every aspect of your MCP experience.
content.customInstructionsText: Add specific instructions to any MCP server to guide AI models in using your tools. These instructions persist across sessions and help maintain consistency.
content.themesText: Choose from multiple themes or create your own custom appearance:
content.workflow1: Set default parameters for frequently used tools
content.workflow2: Create keyboard shortcuts for common actions
content.tip1: Use markdown in custom instructions for better formatting
content.tip2: Export your customizations to share with your team
content.tip3: Create different profiles for different types of work

lightning-fast-startup.title: Lightning-Fast MCP Server Startup
lightning-fast-startup.description: Experience instant server connections with progressive initialization

content.intro: Say goodbye to waiting for slow MCP servers to start. Progressive server initialization means your servers connect instantly and recover automatically from connection issues.
content.benefit1: No more waiting for slow servers

public-profile.title: Your Public Profile Page
public-profile.description: Showcase your MCP servers and collections with a personalized developer profile

content.intro: Every developer now has a public profile page at /to/username. Share your best MCP configurations, showcase your collections, and connect with other developers.
content.feature2: Display your shared servers and collections
content.feature4: Track your impact with installation counts
content.setupStep1: Go to Settings and choose a unique username
content.setupStep2: Add your bio and profile picture
content.setupStep3: Share servers to showcase on your profile

import-export-setup.title: Import & Export Your Setup
import-export-setup.description: Backup, share, and transfer your MCP configurations with one click

content.intro: Never lose your carefully crafted MCP setup again. Export entire collections for backup or sharing with your team.

multilingual-support.title: Speak Your Language
multilingual-support.description: Use Plugged.in in your preferred language with support for 6 languages

content.intro: Plugged.in now speaks your language! Choose from English, Turkish, Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, or Dutch.
content.contributeText: Found a translation issue? Help us improve by contributing to our translation efforts.

discover-capabilities.title: Discover Server Capabilities
discover-capabilities.description: Automatically discover and explore all tools, resources, and prompts from your MCP servers

content.intro: Full MCP specification support means you can discover everything your servers offer - tools, resources, prompts, and templates.
content.discoveryStep1: Go to your MCP server details
content.discoveryStep3: View all discovered items in tabs

tryItNow.title: Ready to try it?
tryItNow.description: Start using these new features in your projects today.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get notified about new features and updates
